name: Glorious Pancakes
description:
How to play:

Navigate with Arrow Keys or WASD

Harvest with E or Left Ctrl

Jump with Space

Progress story by pressing any button

(It is possible to play with controller (Harvest on A and Jump on Y), but the jumping is a little wonky to begin with and the controller doesn't make it easier.

It's possibly to get stuck behind the cow, but unfortunately we ran out of time to fix that.

The game has three different endings if you want to attempt to get them all.
